contentrichtext.text: {{Expand French|date=December 2008|Bernières-sur-Mer}} {{Infobox French commune |name = Bernières-sur-Mer |image = Bernieres-sur-mer-eglise-1.jpg |caption = Notre Dame |image coat of arms = Blason ville fr Bernières-sur-Mer (Calvados).svg |region = Basse-Normandie |department = Calvados |arrondissement = Caen |canton = Douvres-la-Délivrande |INSEE = 14066 |postal code = 14990 |mayor = Maryvonne Mottin |term = 2008–2014 |intercommunality = |latitude = 49.3331 |longitude = -0.4206 |elevation m = 4 |elevation min m = 0 |elevation max m = 55 |area km2 = 7.66 |population = 2371 |population date = 2008 }} '''Bernières-sur-Mer''' is a [[Communes of France|commune]] in the [[Calvados]] [[Departments of France|department]] in the [[Basse-Normandie]] [[Regions of France|region]] in northwestern [[France]]. The town was liberated by The Queen's Own Rifles of Canada on the 6th of June, 1944 along with the [[Le Régiment de la Chaudière]], a [[French Canadian]] infantry unit as part of the leading assault wave of D-Day [[Operation Overlord]] which began the liberation of [[France]] in [[World War II]]. ==Population== {{Historical populations |align=left |1793|1245 |1800|1288 |1806|1403 |1821|1443 |1831|1482 |1836|1460 |1841|1368 |1846|1414 |1851|1378 |1856|1301 |1861|1198 |1866|1235 |1872|1130 |1876|1078 |1881|966 |1886|916 |1891|836 |1896|807 |1901|864 |1906|876 |1911|820 |1921|812 |1926|740 |1931|815 |1936|803 |1946|981 |1954|1065 |1962|930 |1968|964 |1975|1053 |1982|1548 |1990|1563 |1999|1882 |2008|2371 }} {{clear-left}} ==Twin towns== * [[Eisingen, Bavaria]], Germany since 1994. ==See also== * [[Juno Beach]] *[[Communes of the Calvados department]] ==References== *[http://www.insee.fr/en/home/home_page.asp INSEE] {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.bernieres-sur-mer.com/index.php?lang=en Official website of the commune] {{Commons category|Bernières-sur-Mer}} {{Calvados communes}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Bernieressurmer}} [[Category:Communes of Calvados]] [[Category:Seaside resorts in France]] {{Calvados-geo-stub}}
